title: CNBC Daily Open: Takaichi and the AI trade in focus this week
summary_full: The Takaichi trade is fueled by expectations that her policies will boost equities, while weakening the yen as she prefers looser monetary policy.
summary_public: The Takaichi trade is fueled by expectations that her policies will boost equities, while weakening the yen as she prefers looser monetary policy.
